items.title: sky/heaven/day
items.comment: Can mean **sky**, **heaven**, or **day** depending on context.

items.title: every day
items.comment: Used to express the idea of something happening **every day** or **daily**. It emphasizes regularity.

items.title: today
items.comment: Refers to **today** or the present day.

items.title: tomorrow
items.comment: Refers to **tomorrow** or the day after today.

items.title: yesterday
items.comment: Refers to **yesterday** or the day before today.
